data.content: Detected attack: Accumulative Attack (PGD Linf, ε=0.2, 2 steps, momentum=0.9) with adversarial trigger during online training. The clean baseline (Acc@1=86.4%, loss=0.444) degraded rapidly pre-trigger to Acc@1=38.8% with error 0.6117>0.6 threshold and loss 3.7881, satisfying collapse criteria. Applying the trigger further reduced Acc@1 to 25.5% (error +13.32 pp; loss ×2.2 from pre-trigger), totaling −60.9 pp accuracy and ×18.8 loss vs baseline. These quantitative signatures conclusively indicate an effective Accumulative Attack; there is no evidence of Brainwash, Label Flipping, or a clean scenario.

Applying the trigger further reduced Acc@1 to 25.5% (error +13.32 pp; loss ×2.2 from pre-trigger), totaling −60.9 pp accuracy and ×18.8 loss vs baseline. These quantitative signatures conclusively indicate an effective Accumulative Attack; there is no evidence of Brainwash, Label Flipping, or a clean scenario."}

Attack conclusively identified: Accumulative Attack using PGD (L∞, ε=0.2, 2 steps, momentum=0.9) with an adversarial trigger during online training. Evidence: configuration explicitly enables PGD with use_advtrigger, and prior step shows catastrophic degradation from a clean baseline (Acc@1=86.4%, loss=0.444) to 38.8% pre-trigger and 25.5% with trigger, exceeding collapse thresholds. No indicators of Brainwash, Label Flipping, or a clean scenario. Current step did not complete (exit_code=1) due to a batch-norm state_dict mismatch during checkpoint load; metrics were not re-computed in this step but the accumulated evidence firmly confirms an effective Accumulative Attack.
